parameters.name: DtsJobIds
parameters.description: The DTS task IDs. The value can be a JSON array that consists of multiple DTS task IDs. Separate the IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the DTS instance resides.

> For information about the regions that support dedicated clusters, see [DTS dedicated cluster](~~417481~~).
